Class SpecificationUtility

java.lang.Object
org.unito.postgreserver.utils.SpecificationUtility
public class SpecificationUtility extends Object
Utility class for creating generic JPA Specifications.

This class provides static methods for creating various types of JPA Specifications using Criteria API. Specifications can be used for filtering entities in JPA queries.

  • Method Details

    • equalsTo

      public static <T> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T> equalsTo(String field, Comparable<?> value)
      Creates a specification that checks if a field is equal to a specific value.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the entity.
      Parameters:
      field - The name of the field to compare with the value.
      value - The value to compare with the field value.
      Returns:
      A Specification that checks for equality, or null if the value is null.

    • equalsTo

      public static <T, J> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T> equalsTo(String joinField, String matchField, Comparable<?> value)
      Creates a specification that checks a joined entity field for equality with a specific value.

      The generic type J is used for context and does not affect the method's behavior.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the entity.
      J - The type of the joined entity (for context only).
      Parameters:
      joinField - The name of the field to join on.
      matchField - The name of the field in the joined entity to compare with the value.
      value - The value to compare with the joined field value.
      Returns:
      A Specification that checks for equality on a joined field, or null if the value is null.

    • equalsTo

      public static <T> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T> equalsTo(String field, List<? extends Comparable<?>> values)
      Creates a specification that checks if a field is equal to any value in the provided list of values.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the entity.
      Parameters:
      field - The name of the field to compare with the values.
      values - The list of values to compare with the field.
      Returns:
      A Specification that checks for equality with each value in the list, combined with AND logic.

    • equalsTo

      public static <T, J> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T> equalsTo(String joinField, String field, List<? extends Comparable<?>> values)
      Creates a specification that checks a joined entity field for equality with all the values in the provided list.

      The generic type J is used for context and does not affect the method's behavior.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the root entity.
      J - The type of the joined entity (for context only).
      Parameters:
      joinField - The name of the field to join on.
      field - The name of the field in the joined entity to compare with the values.
      values - The list of values to compare with the joined field.
      Returns:
      A Specification that checks for equality with each value in the list, combined with AND logic, on the joined field.

    • greaterThan

      public static <T> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T> greaterThan(String field, Number value)
      Creates a specification that checks if a field is greater than a specific value.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the entity.
      Parameters:
      field - The name of the field to compare with the value.
      value - The value to compare with the field value.
      Returns:
      A Specification that checks for greater than comparison, or null if the value is null.

    • greaterThan

      public static <T, J> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T> greaterThan(String joinField, String matchField, Number value)
      Creates a specification that checks a joined entity field for being greater than a specific value.

      The generic type J is used for context and does not affect the method's behavior.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the entity.
      J - The type of the joined entity (for context only).
      Parameters:
      joinField - The name of the field to join on.
      matchField - The name of the field in the joined entity to compare with the value.
      value - The value to compare with the joined field value.
      Returns:
      A Specification that checks for greater than on a joined field, or null if the value is null.

      The generic type J is used for context and does not affect the method's behavior.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the entity.
      J - The type of the joined entity (for context only).
      Parameters:
      joinField - The name of the field to join on.
      matchField - The name of the field in the joined entity to compare with the value.
      value - The value to compare with the joined field value.
      Returns:
      A Specification that checks for not equals on a joined field, or null if the value is null.

    • equalsIn

      public static <T> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T> equalsIn(String field, List<? extends Comparable<?>> values)
      Creates a specification that checks if a field value is included in a list of values.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the entity.
      Parameters:
      field - The name of the field to compare with the value.
      values - The list of values to compare with the field value.
      Returns:
      A Specification that checks for inclusion in a list, or null if the list is null or empty.

    • equalsIn

      public static <T, J> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T> equalsIn(String joinField, String matchField, List<? extends Comparable<?>> values)
      Creates a specification that checks if a joined entity field value is included in a list of values.

      The generic type J is used for context and does not affect the method's behavior.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the entity.
      J - The type of the joined entity (for context only).
      Parameters:
      joinField - The name of the field to join on.
      matchField - The name of the field in the joined entity to compare with the value.
      values - The list of values to compare with the joined field value.
      Returns:
      A Specification that checks for inclusion in a list on a joined field, or null if the list is null or empty.

    • like

      public static <T> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T> like(String field, String value)
      Creates a specification that performs a case-insensitive "like" search on a given field.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the entity.
      Parameters:
      field - The name of the field to compare with the value.
      value - The value to search for, using a "like" pattern (e.g., '%value%').
      Returns:
      A Specification that performs a case-insensitive "like" search, or null if the value is null or empty.

    • like

      public static <T, J> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T> like(String joinField, String matchField, String value)
      Creates a specification that performs a case-insensitive "like" search on a joinField of a joined entity.

      The generic type J is used for context and does not affect the method's behavior.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the entity.
      J - The type of the joined entity (for context only).
      Parameters:
      joinField - The name of the field to join on.
      matchField - The name of the field in the joined entity to compare with the value.
      value - The value to search for, using a "like" pattern (e.g., '%value%').
      Returns:
      A Specification that performs a case-insensitive "like" search on a joined field, or null if the value is null or empty.

    • like

      public static <T> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T> like(String field, List<String> values)
      Creates a specification that performs a case-insensitive "like" search to any value in the provided list of values.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the entity.
      Parameters:
      field - The name of the field to compare with the value.
      values - The list of values to search for, using a "like" pattern (e.g., '%value%').
      Returns:
      A Specification that performs a case-insensitive "like" search with each value in the list combined with AND logic, or null if the list of values is null or empty.

    • like

      public static <T, J> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T> like(String joinField, String field, List<String> values)
      Creates a specification that that performs a case-insensitive "like" search on a joined entity with all the values in the provided list.

      The generic type J is used for context and does not affect the method's behavior.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the root entity.
      J - The type of the joined entity (for context only).
      Parameters:
      joinField - The name of the field to join on.
      field - The name of the field in the joined entity to compare with the values.
      values - The list of values to search for, using a "like" pattern (e.g., '%value%')
      Returns:
      A Specification that performs a case-insensitive "like" search on a joined field combined with AND logic, or null if the list of values is null or empty.

    • combineWithAnd

      public static <T> org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T> combineWithAnd(List<org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<T>> specifications)
      Combines a list of specifications into a single specification using logical AND.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the entity.
      Parameters:
      specifications - The list of specifications to combine.
      Returns:
      A combined Specification, or null if the input list is null or empty.
